lead_paragraph: Dao-Yi Chow, Maxwell Osborne, Prabal Gurung and other fashion insiders toast the Year of the Monkey at Indochine.

headline.print_headline: Embracing the Year of the Monkey
headline.main: A Fashion Crowd Celebrates Chinese New Year

snippet: Dao-Yi Chow, Maxwell Osborne, Prabal Gurung and other fashion insiders toast the Year of the Monkey at Indochine.
abstract: Dao-Yi Chow, co-designer at fashion labels Public School and DKNY, hosts Chinese New Year's dinner at NoHo restaurant Indochine.
